name: @hola-mundo-dapp/monorepo
author: Daiana Bilbao
description: A DApp that let's others send me coffee with crypto! ☕️ * View verified smart contract on Mumbai: https://mumbai.polygonscan.com/address/0xD9eA50f537bDc8A5c3cFBD5dfef04Dea846212d5#code ### Road to Web3 Week 2 Challenge: Build "Buy Me a Coffee" DeFi DApp * https://docs.alchemy.com/docs/how-to-build-buy-me-a-coffee-defi-dapp * I followed the smart contract portion exactly as the tutorial instructed. The only difference was that I deployed to Mumbai.  * On the front-end, I free-styled it.
